title: President condoles political worker’s death in PTI long march attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 4 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday expressed condolence over the death of Moazzam Nawaz, a political worker killed during an attack on the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf’s long march in Wazirabad on Thursday.
“My all sympathies go with the bereaved family and the children of Moazzam Nawaz,” the president said in a statement.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to grant peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
